channel.title: DAO on Hugi's Elephant
channel.description: Recent content in DAO on Hugi's Elephant

item.title: What if AI makes money
item.description: There has been no lack of AI anxiety going around. So let me just throw another idea out there. What if AI makes money? Of course it will be programmed to make money on its own. Of course it is already better at a lot of things than most people. Of course it will be better at doing everything even making money very soon. AutoGPT already demonstrated that when given a goal an AI program can figure out how to achieve that goal.
